channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- buddybadges

item.title: CVE-2022-3925|2024-08-03T01:20:58.822Z -- unknown -- buddybadges
item.description: The buddybadges WordPress plugin through 1.0.0 does not sanitise and escape a parameter before using it in a SQL statement, leading to a SQL injection exploitable by high privilege users
